Articles.Content: I'm about to do shuttle missions in my main game, but I want to test the craft in a separate game. It's probably simple, but how do I move a craft file from one game to another so I can test it? After I'm done testing it, I'll want to move it back to my main game. Thanks

You just need to copy the respective .craft file from the <KSP Directory>\Saves\<Save Game Directory>\Ships\<VAB or SPH>\shipname.craft to your test game.

Edited December 23, 2019 by VoidSquid
